title: Paradise Gakuen
description: Paradise Gakuen's annual competition Miss Paradise is coming soon! But a major incident occured: one of the girls hoped to be a contestant, Chihiro, had her precious part seen by a boy! Chihiro who holds a principle that she won't let anyone other than her husband to see her naked, wants to become Shiba's wife. Because the latter didn't believe her intention, she decides to prove it, by entering the annual competition!
